title: Dead Wolf Walking
description: One bite changed my life.I was living life to the fullest when a wolf attacked.Now I’ve been ripped from my home and shipped off to Bad Moon Academy, a place for changed wolves. Or so I’m told.There’s something sinister lurking within the confines of the academy, and I’m starting to think I was brought here as a sacrifice.This is a dark academy reverse harem with dangerously possessive shifters.
author: Rory Miles
